verses.verse: I <S%H3772>made<s%> a <S%H1285>covenant<s%> with mine <S%H5869>eyes;<s%> <S%H4100>why<s%> then should I <S%H995>think<s%> <S%H5921>upon<s%> a <S%H1330>maid?<s%>

For <S%H4100>what<s%> <S%H2506>portion<s%> of <S%H433>God<s%> is there from <S%H4480>above?<s%> <S%H4605><s%> and what <S%H5159>inheritance<s%> of the <S%H7706>Almighty<s%> from on <S%H4480>high?<s%> <S%H4791><s%>
Is <S%H3808>not<s%> <S%H343>destruction<s%> to the <S%H5767>wicked?<s%> and a <S%H5235>strange<s%> punishment to the <S%H6466>workers<s%> of <S%H205>iniquity?<s%>
Doth <S%H3808>not<s%> <S%H1931>he<s%> <S%H7200>see<s%> my <S%H1870>ways,<s%> and <S%H5608>count<s%> <S%H3605>all<s%> my <S%H6806>steps?<s%>
If <S%H518><s%> I have <S%H1980>walked<s%> <S%H5973>with<s%> <S%H7723>vanity,<s%> or if my <S%H7272>foot<s%> hath <S%H2363>hasted<s%> <S%H5921>to<s%> <S%H4820>deceit;<s%>
Let me be <S%H8254>weighed<s%> in an <S%H6664>even<s%> <S%H3976>balance,<s%> that <S%H433>God<s%> may <S%H3045>know<s%> mine <S%H8538>integrity.<s%>

If <S%H518><s%> my <S%H838>step<s%> hath <S%H5186>turned<s%> out <S%H4480>of<s%> the <S%H1870>way,<s%> and mine <S%H3820>heart<s%> <S%H1980>walked<s%> <S%H310>after<s%> mine <S%H5869>eyes,<s%> and if any <S%H3971>blot<s%> hath <S%H1692>cleaved<s%> to mine <S%H3709>hands;<s%>
Then let me <S%H2232>sow,<s%> and let <S%H312>another<s%> <S%H398>eat;<s%> yea, let my <S%H6631>offspring<s%> be rooted <S%H8327>out.<s%>

If <S%H518><s%> mine <S%H3820>heart<s%> have been <S%H6601>deceived<s%> <S%H5921>by<s%> a <S%H802>woman,<s%> or if I have laid <S%H693>wait<s%> <S%H5921>at<s%> my <S%H7453>neighbor's<s%> <S%H6607>door;<s%>
Then let my <S%H802>wife<s%> <S%H2912>grind<s%> unto <S%H312>another,<s%> and let <S%H312>others<s%> bow <S%H3766>down<s%> <S%H5921>upon<s%> her.
For <S%H3588><s%> <S%H1931>this<s%> is a heinous <S%H2154>crime;<s%> yea, <S%H1931>it<s%> is an <S%H5771>iniquity<s%> to be punished by the <S%H6414>judges.<s%>
For <S%H3588><s%> <S%H1931>it<s%> is a <S%H784>fire<s%> that <S%H398>consumeth<s%> <S%H5704>to<s%> <S%H11>destruction,<s%> and would root <S%H8327>out<s%> <S%H3605>all<s%> mine <S%H8393>increase.<s%>
If <S%H518><s%> I did <S%H3988>despise<s%> the <S%H4941>cause<s%> of my <S%H5650>manservant<s%> or of my <S%H519>maidservant,<s%> when they <S%H7378>contended<s%> <S%H5978>with<s%> me;

What <S%H4100><s%> then shall I <S%H6213>do<s%> <S%H3588>when<s%> <S%H410>God<s%> riseth <S%H6965>up?<s%> and <S%H3588>when<s%> he <S%H6485>visiteth,<s%> <S%H4100>what<s%> shall I <S%H7725>answer<s%> him?
Did <S%H3808>not<s%> he that <S%H6213>made<s%> me in the <S%H990>womb<s%> <S%H6213>make<s%> him? and did not <S%H259>one<s%> <S%H3559>fashion<s%> us in the <S%H7358>womb?<s%>
If <S%H518><s%> I have <S%H4513>withheld<s%> the <S%H1800>poor<s%> from their <S%H4480>desire,<s%> <S%H2656><s%> or have caused the <S%H5869>eyes<s%> of the <S%H490>widow<s%> to <S%H3615>fail;<s%>
Or have <S%H398>eaten<s%> my <S%H6595>morsel<s%> myself <S%H905>alone,<s%> and the <S%H3490>fatherless<s%> hath <S%H3808>not<s%> <S%H398>eaten<s%> <S%H4480>thereof;<s%>

(For <S%H3588><s%> from my <S%H4480>youth<s%> <S%H5271><s%> he was brought <S%H1431>up<s%> with me, as with a <S%H1>father,<s%> and I have <S%H5148>guided<s%> her from my <S%H517>mother's<s%> <S%H4480>womb;)<s%> <S%H990><s%>
If <S%H518><s%> I have <S%H7200>seen<s%> any <S%H6>perish<s%> for <S%H4480>want<s%> <S%H1097><s%> of <S%H3830>clothing,<s%> or any <S%H34>poor<s%> <S%H369>without<s%> <S%H3682>covering;<s%>
If <S%H518><s%> his <S%H2504>loins<s%> have <S%H3808>not<s%> <S%H1288>blessed<s%> me, and if he were not <S%H2552>warmed<s%> with the <S%H4480>fleece<s%> <S%H1488><s%> of my <S%H3532>sheep;<s%>

If <S%H518><s%> I have lifted <S%H5130>up<s%> my <S%H3027>hand<s%> <S%H5921>against<s%> the <S%H3490>fatherless,<s%> <S%H3588>when<s%> I <S%H7200>saw<s%> my <S%H5833>help<s%> in the gate: <S%H8179><s%>
Then let mine <S%H3802>arm<s%> <S%H5307>fall<s%> from my shoulder <S%H4480>blade,<s%> <S%H7929><s%> and mine <S%H248>arm<s%> be <S%H7665>broken<s%> from the <S%H4480>bone.<s%> <S%H7070><s%>

For <S%H3588><s%> <S%H343>destruction<s%> from <S%H410>God<s%> was a <S%H6343>terror<s%> <S%H413>to<s%> me, and by reason of his <S%H4480>highness<s%> <S%H7613><s%> I <S%H3201>could<s%> <S%H3808>not<s%> endure.
If <S%H518><s%> I have <S%H7760>made<s%> <S%H2091>gold<s%> my <S%H3689>hope,<s%> or have <S%H559>said<s%> to the fine <S%H3800>gold,<s%> Thou art my <S%H4009>confidence;<s%>
If <S%H518><s%> I <S%H8055>rejoiced<s%> <S%H3588>because<s%> my <S%H2428>wealth<s%> was <S%H7227>great,<s%> and <S%H3588>because<s%> mine <S%H3027>hand<s%> had <S%H4672>gotten<s%> <S%H3524>much;<s%>
If <S%H518><s%> I <S%H7200>beheld<s%> the <S%H216>sun<s%> <S%H3588>when<s%> it <S%H1984>shined,<s%> or the <S%H3394>moon<s%> <S%H1980>walking<s%> in <S%H3368>brightness;<s%>
And my <S%H3820>heart<s%> hath been <S%H5643>secretly<s%> <S%H6601>enticed,<s%> or my <S%H6310>mouth<s%> hath <S%H5401>kissed<s%> my hand: <S%H3027><s%>

This <S%H1931><s%> <S%H1571>also<s%> were an <S%H5771>iniquity<s%> to be punished by the <S%H6416>judge:<s%> <S%H3588>for<s%> I should have <S%H3584>denied<s%> the <S%H410>God<s%> that is <S%H4480>above.<s%> <S%H4605><s%>
If <S%H518><s%> I <S%H8055>rejoiced<s%> at the <S%H6365>destruction<s%> of him that <S%H8130>hated<s%> me, or lifted up <S%H5782>myself<s%> <S%H3588>when<s%> <S%H7451>evil<s%> <S%H4672>found<s%> him:
Neither <S%H3808><s%> have I <S%H5414>suffered<s%> my <S%H2441>mouth<s%> to <S%H2398>sin<s%> by <S%H7592>wishing<s%> a <S%H423>curse<s%> to his <S%H5315>soul.<s%>

If <S%H518><s%> the <S%H4962>men<s%> of my <S%H168>tabernacle<s%> <S%H559>said<s%> <S%H3808>not,<s%> Oh <S%H4310>that<s%> we <S%H5414>had<s%> of his <S%H4480>flesh!<s%> <S%H1320><s%> we <S%H3808>cannot<s%> be <S%H7646>satisfied.<s%>
The <S%H1616>stranger<s%> did <S%H3808>not<s%> <S%H3885>lodge<s%> in the <S%H2351>street:<s%> but I <S%H6605>opened<s%> my <S%H1817>doors<s%> to the <S%H734>traveler.<s%>
If <S%H518><s%> I <S%H3680>covered<s%> my <S%H6588>transgressions<s%> as <S%H121>Adam,<s%> by <S%H2934>hiding<s%> mine <S%H5771>iniquity<s%> in my bosom: <S%H2243><s%>

Did I <S%H6206>fear<s%> a <S%H7227>great<s%> <S%H1995>multitude,<s%> or did the <S%H937>contempt<s%> of <S%H4940>families<s%> <S%H2865>terrify<s%> me, that I kept <S%H1826>silence,<s%> and went not <S%H3318>out<s%> <S%H3808><s%> of the <S%H6607>door?<s%>

Oh <S%H4310>that<s%> one <S%H5414>would<s%> <S%H8085>hear<s%> me! <S%H2005>behold,<s%> my <S%H8420>desire<s%> is, that the <S%H7706>Almighty<s%> would <S%H6030>answer<s%> me, and that mine <S%H376>adversary<s%> <S%H7379><s%> had <S%H3789>written<s%> a <S%H5612>book.<s%>
Surely <S%H518><s%> I would <S%H5375>take<s%> it <S%H5921>upon<s%> my <S%H7926>shoulder,<s%> and <S%H6029>bind<s%> it as a <S%H5850>crown<s%> to me.
I would <S%H5046>declare<s%> unto him the <S%H4557>number<s%> of my <S%H6806>steps;<s%> <S%H3644>as<s%> a <S%H5057>prince<s%> would I go near <S%H7126>unto<s%> him.
If <S%H518><s%> my <S%H127>land<s%> <S%H2199>cry<s%> <S%H5921>against<s%> me, or that the <S%H8525>furrows<s%> <S%H3162>likewise<s%> thereof <S%H1058>complain;<s%>

If <S%H518><s%> I have <S%H398>eaten<s%> the <S%H3581>fruits<s%> thereof <S%H1097>without<s%> <S%H3701>money,<s%> or have caused the <S%H1167>owners<s%> thereof to <S%H5301>lose<s%> their life: <S%H5315><s%>

Let <S%H2336>thistles<s%> <S%H3318>grow<s%> <S%H8478>instead<s%> of <S%H2406>wheat,<s%> and <S%H890>cockle<s%> <S%H8478>instead<s%> of <S%H8184>barley.<s%> The <S%H1697>words<s%> of <S%H347>Job<s%> are <S%H8552>ended.<s%>
